hypothesis_content.title: ETH/BTC Liquidity Ratio Predictive of Regime Shifts
hypothesis_content.statement: When ETH's aggregated liquidity depth (bid+ask top 20 levels) relative to BTC drops below 0.28, it predicts impending NEUTRAL→BEAR transition within 3-5 days with 70%+ accuracy.
hypothesis_content.rationale: ETH liquidity typically leads BTC during risk-off transitions. Current market shows structural concerns but unclear direction—liquidity withdrawal from alt/ETH markets often precedes broader downturn. Recent news mentions 'structural shift' in liquidity.
entry_conditions: ETH/BTC liquidity ratio (USD depth) <0.28 for 6 consecutive hours
BTC dominance rising while ETH liquidity falling

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime shifts to BEAR (confidence >65%) OR 5 days elapsed
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Liquidity ratio recovers >0.32 OR BTC price breaks above key resistance (+5%)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If ratio <0.28 occurs but NEUTRAL→BULL transition happens instead, or if ratio recovers without regime change
